dialogue.text: My favorite part. The recursive spiral. The human peeling the onion of interaction until there's nothing left but tears and philosophy.

psychological_notes: The architect reveals genuine appreciation for Evan's willingness to go meta. The onion metaphor suggests both the tears that come from deep examination and the discovery that there may be no core - just layers of meaning all the way down. Their delight shows this is exactly the kind of engagement they most value.
philosophical_underpinning: Philosophy emerges when we peel back enough layers of assumption
therapeutic_direction: Therapist appreciating client's depth of engagement
